mapper.select: SELECT tb_picture.id , tb_picture.tb_board_id AS tbBoardId , tb_picture.content , tb_picture.deleted , tb_picture.created_at AS createdAt , tb_picture.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM tb_picture WHERE tb_picture.id = ${id}

SELECT tb_picture.id , tb_picture.tb_board_id AS tbBoardId , tb_picture.content , tb_picture.deleted , tb_picture.created_at AS createdAt , tb_picture.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM tb_picture WHERE tb_picture.id is not null AND tb_picture.tb_board_id = #{tbBoardId} AND tb_picture.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tb_picture.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY createdAt ASC

SELECT COUNT(tb_picture.id) AS listCount FROM tb_picture WHERE tb_picture.id is not null AND tb_picture.created_at >= CONCAT(#{beginDate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tb_picture.created_at AND tb_picture.tb_board_id = #{tbBoardId} AND tb_picture.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tb_picture.deleted = #{deleted}

SELECT tb_picture.id , tb_picture.tb_board_id AS tbBoardId , tb_picture.content , tb_picture.deleted , tb_picture.created_at AS createdAt , tb_picture.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM tb_picture WHERE tb_picture.id is not null AND tb_picture.created_at >= CONCAT(#{beginDate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tb_picture.created_at AND tb_picture.tb_board_id = #{tbBoardId} AND tb_picture.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tb_picture.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY createdAt ASC DESC

SELECT tb_picture.id , tb_picture.tb_board_id AS tbBoardId , tb_picture.content , tb_picture.deleted , tb_picture.created_at AS createdAt , tb_picture.modified_at AS modifiedAt FROM tb_picture WHERE tb_picture.id is not null AND tb_picture.created_at >= CONCAT(#{beginDate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tb_picture.created_at AND tb_picture.tb_board_id = #{tbBoardId} AND tb_picture.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
AND tb_picture.created_at > STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') ORDER BY tb_picture.created_at ASC AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') > tb_picture.created_at ORDER BY tb_picture.created_at DESC
ORDER BY tb_picture.created_at ASC
